cause.description:
Push America is the national philanthropy of Pi Kappa Phi which serves to promote awareness, money, and volunteerism for people with disabilities. This summer I will be riding my bike across the country with the "Journey of Hope" in order to help raise money for Push.
1. People with disabilities should be treated with the respect and dignity they deserve
cause.mission: Building leaders of tomorrow by serving people with disabilities today.
cause.name: Push America
